tool.name: Missing Value Filter
tool.description: Step7 of SimStitch. Filter samples that have too many missing values.

param.name: tails
param.label: How many tails or sides for confidence limit (default 2-tails, un-check for 1-tail)

param.name: sd_flag
param.label: To use Standard Deviations (SD) or Standard Errors (SE) (default SD, un-check for SE)

tool.help: This tool is purely a test for a) obtaining the user's IP address b) calling the LWR client from within the tool that is being run locally by Galaxy (using the user's IP address) c) passing a job to the user's computer for processing using the LWR client.
